headline: Is It Time To Reassess NextEra Energy (NEE) After A 36% One Year Rally
summary: If you have been wondering whether NextEra Energy's share price still lines up with its underlying value, this article is designed to help you answer that in a clear and practical way. Over shorter periods, the stock has recorded returns of 1.5% over the last week, 12.6% over the last month, 12.9% year to date and 36.0% over the last year, which can change how the market is thinking about its potential and risk. These moves are happening against a backdrop where investors are paying close...

headline: How Euro Debentures And AI Data Center Deals At NextEra Energy (NEE) Have Changed Its Investment Story
summary: In recent days, a NextEra Energy subsidiary completed the sale of €1.30 billion in euro-denominated debentures, while management highlighted how surging AI-driven data center power needs and a 95‑gigawatt clean energy pipeline could reshape the company’s long-term growth profile. Together with new load-focused collaborations and large tech customer agreements, these funding and demand tailwinds position NextEra to be a key supplier of low-carbon electricity to energy-intensive data...

headline: Exelon Q4 Earnings Beat Estimates, Sales Miss, Capex Plan Up
summary: EXC tops Q4 earnings estimates, boosts 2026 EPS outlook and unveils a $41.3 billion infrastructure investment plan through 2029.

headline: Ameren Q4 Earnings Higher Than Expected, Revenues Decline Y/Y
summary: AEE's Q4 EPS beats estimates, revenues drop 8.2%, and higher operating income and rising sales volumes lift full-year earnings 8.6%.
